jason.functions

Class Count

  • java.lang.Object
    • jason.asSemantics.DefaultArithFunction
      • jason.functions.Count
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArithFunction, java.io.Serializable

    public class Count
extends DefaultArithFunction

    Function: .count(B): counts the number of occurrences of a particular belief (pattern) in the agent's belief base, as the internal action .count.

    Example:

    • .count(a(2,_)): returns the number of beliefs that unify with a(2,_).
    See Also:
    internal action version, Serialized Form
